document.text:
From: 
To: Gloria Allred  
Subject: 
Re: Urgent! ,an Epstein victim, just told me that she was able to get child care 
and would like to fly to New York for the hearing Tuesday. What is your telephone number, 
M, so that I can call you 
a.s.a.p.? 
Date: Sun, 25 Aug 2019 18:25:11 +0000 
Inline-Images: image001.png; image002jpg 
Thanks, I sent this to a. 
> On Aug 25, 2019, at 2:24 PM, Gloria Allred ..tj > wrote: 
Martindale
-Hubbell 
PREEMINENT' 
ALLRED, MAROKO & GOLDBERG 2018 
Lawyers
 
Best
EFTA00019682
